name: Lapis albus
Relationship: Compare: SILICA.; BADIAGA; ARS. IOD.; CALC. IOD.; CON.; KAL. IOD.; ASTERIAS.

Skin: Enlargement and induration of glands, ESPECIALLY CERVICAL
Ears: Where silica is indicated progress is hastened by LAPIS

details: Affections of glands, GOITRE, pre-ulcerative stage of carcinoma. Burning, stinging pain in breast, stomach and uterus. Connective tissue about glands specially affected. Fat anaemic babies with Iodine appetite. Ravenous appetite. Remarkably successful in scrofulous affections, except in malarial cases. UTERINE CARCINOMA. Fibroid tumors with INTENSE BURNING pains through the part with PROFUSE HEMORRHAGE. Glands have a certain elasticity and pliability about them rather than the stony hardness of CALC. FLUOR AND CISTUS.
